Plot: Three friends attempt to recapture their glory days by opening up a fraternity near their alma mater.
Title: Old School
Writer: Court Crandall (story), Todd Phillips (story), Scot Armstrong (story), Todd Phillips (screenplay), Scot Armstrong (screenplay)
Actors: Luke Wilson, Will Ferrell, Vince Vaughn, Jeremy Piven
tomatoConsensus: While not consistently funny, the movie does have its moments.
